attributes.action: NO MORE BAIL OUT FOR BANKS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please can the tax payer stop bailing out these toxic banks, We are better of guaranteeing the consumers money in the bank and asking them the transfer their hard earned cash in to a stable bank and close HBOS and RBS down, We cannot continue to bank roll such vast numbers of money in to bad debt.

 

Many thanks

Darren
